| 448 | 2560x1440 | 1056x496 |
| 480 | 2560x1440 | 1040x480 |
| 512 | 2560x1440 | 1024x464 |

| 576 | 2560x1440 | 992x432 |
| 608 | 2560x1440 | 976x416 |
